events: I was accepted to be one of 5 HCMUS representatives for the KIT Online Spring School 2023.
I was awarded a full scholarship of 50M VND for the Global Developer Scholarship by MindX and Code For Vietnam Foundation.
I won Third place for GameUIT Hackathon with Trassify

I got the paper "Gamified solution to enhance students' interest in History - Immersion Learning and Gamification" accepted for oral presentation, and awarded Best Paper at the International Student Science Forum 2022, HCMC.
I joined LEAN Social as a Software Engineer.
I started my first internship as a Software Engineering Intern at Tiki.
I was accepted for VNU-HCM University of Science, Advanced Program in Computer Science, class of 2025.
